message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its innovative features and high-quality materials. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I'd like to offer it to you for $150. This price reflects the superior quality and functionality of the product. I believe you'll find it well worth the investment.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value and quality of your product. However, based on my budget and research, I am willing to pay no more than $120 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to consider your offer. Therefore, I would like to counteroffer at $140 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget.
